text: Such that is to say like the chastisement for these people will be the chastisement for those disbelievers of Mecca and others who contravene Our command; and the chastisement of the Hereafter is assuredly greater did they but know its chastisement they would not have contavened Our command. When they said â€˜If we are resurrected we shall be given better than what you have been given the following was revealed
